title: Presenting signs and symptoms that trigger suspicion of IPV and clinical inquiry
description: Presenting signs and symptoms that trigger clinical enquiry of IPV. The Input Options listed below are based on Health care for women subjected to intimate partner violence or sexual violence â€“ a clinical handbook (3)

mapping.name: Digital Adaptation Kit for Antenatal Care

element.short: Presenting signs and symptoms that trigger suspicion of IPV and clinical inquiry
element.comment: WHO does not recommend universal screening for violence of women attending health care. WHO does encourage health-care providers to raise the topic with women who have injuries or conditions that they suspect may be related to violence.
